body:
Part 1 is talking about his parent divorced due to unknown reason, and it turned out to be that he and his mother are cheating together. It happens when he started raping his mother, typical hentai plot, and his mother got addicted to it. Then his stepmother found out that his mother is a doctor of her, and they were caught having sex.

The start of part 2 was, after having sex, he exchanges information with his mother regarding his stepmother's past. His stepmother was cheating in the company with her senior. So he blackmailed his stepmother into becoming one of his sex partner. Last page was his stepmother talking to his father on the phone, telling him their son and mother relationship are getting better and better.
Im confused who are the two girls? Is the doctor his mom or somethhing and is the second one his stepmom?
